storyInfo: At the top of the command tower, Amiya, Logos, and Ascalon battle the Sanguinarch and Manfred to a stalemate.

attributes.content: Four Years Ago...
Time goes by fast for your race and your country, compared to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Not long after the titan that was Gaul collapsed, Victoria and Leithanien feasted on its remnants as quickly and ferociously as they could. It has only been a few dozen years, and the Gallic Era has long since come and gone.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You never witnessed Corsica I's battleships and cannons. You have never knew Lingones's prosperity and pride. The lands of your father's generation have been integrated into the territories of Victoria's most provincial nobles.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The uniform you wear is that of a high-ranking Victorian officer. The medals you wear are all Victorian.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You speak the most standard Victorian as the Londinier nobility do, without even the slightest hint of Gaulish accent.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: When you walk before me and claim you want to negotiate with the Sarkaz, what gives you the right to call yourself Gaulish?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Your Highness, Gaul has not a single city left.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The man who stands before you is not a Gaulish man, but a Gaulish survivor.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Some of us live in Victoria, some in Columbia, and some in Leithanien. We did not choose this exile. We've long been without a place to call home.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You wish to rebuild Gaul?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Yes, just as you and other Sarkaz wish to rebuild Kazdel.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Two centuries ago, the Gaulish Empire's artillery battalion also surrounded the walls of Kazdel.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And now you will speak of yourself in the same breath as the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Victoria was in that war against Kazdel, too. And from what I heard, the reason you and the Military Commission were able to enter Londinium was precisely because of an invitation from Duke Cavendish.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Then I'm certain you've heard what has become of him.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Ten days ago, Duke Stafford stirred up an uprising in Londinium, and Duke Cavendish stepped forward to put a stop to his scheme.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The Londinium Defense Forces joined the battle as well. Too bad. Neither Duke Stafford nor Duke Cavendish survived the other's cannonfire.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I'm sure you know this better than me. The other dukes are all paying keen attention to Londinium's situation right now. No matter what you are planning to do within the city, you will need a new helping hand.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: This is how you will work with the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Correct. As you can see, the Gaulish remnant will fully support all of the Kazdel Military Commission's activities in Londinium.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: In exchange, we only ask that you return the few Gaulish cities to Gaulish rule in Victoria's forthcoming chaos.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What good is my promise? A nation's destruction has nothing to do with the number of cities it has.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I understand that, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: But... We can't afford to wait for a more opportune time than this.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I know a Youth Vanguard. He once served directly under the Gaulish Emperor's Guards.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: When I met him, he was already sixty-something. However, the Guards had long disappeared during the Battle of the Four Emperors. He never got the chance to become a Vieux Vanguard.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: He told me about the spirited emperor, their indomitable fleet, and the troops' idle conversations during mobilization. Over the decades, he has always insisted on telling his stories in Gaulish.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Now, he lies in a small sanatorium in the Chep Borough of Londinium. I paid him a visit not too long ago, and he has already forgotten how to speak.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Even so, whenever he sees Gaulish imperial-style architecture on the telly, his muddy eyes regain their former vigor without fail, and he lifts his spasming hands to clap.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: He will be gone in no more than five years.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The last generation of Gaulishmen who have truly seen Gaul with their own eyes is dying.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Your Majesty, you are right. Compared to the Sarkaz, our lives are insignificant. Our memories... cannot be passed on through our blood.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: When the final witnesses pass away, our memories of Gaul will disperse with the wind like the empire. When that moment comes, Gaul will truly be lost.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: All we can do is to grasp at the ashes as best we can.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Ballistae! Fire!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Hold the sealing layer! Do not let them any closer!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: These Defense Forces men... A tad bit stubborn, aren't they?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Because their leader is still up there.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: These soldiers... really respect their commander.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander, the Sarkaz are here! The Rhodes Island Operators are engaged in battle with them!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Back them up. We need to draw the enemy's attention on this facade of a battlefield to the best of our ability. To buy the Doctor time.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: My guess is the mercenaries at Highbury died by your hands.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: War is imminent. Both you and I know it in our hearts.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ascalon, you were born and raised in Kazdel. The General plucked you from a corpse pile, the Regent taught you to use a weapon, to defend yourself and your homeland.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But now, at this moment when all Sarkaz must stand together, what are you and those Sarkaz at Rhodes Island doing?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Are you going to give our information to the Victorians? To... a group of outbloods that once trampled upon Kazdel?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You betrayed the promise you once made. You betrayed Kazdel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Kazdel is several thousand kilometers from here.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: During the civil war, you chose to become Babel's assassin. I couldn't stop you, nor did I have reason to.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: After all, you were serving Her Majesty Theresa, the sole King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But what do you serve now...? A phantom of the past?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The civil war ended long ago, and now even Her Majesty Theresa has returned to our side...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Four years ago... You were the ones who killed her.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: And now you will sully her death so dishonorably.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Who's the real traitor?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: —Urgh!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ascalon's attack cuts through his Arts.
The two of them have been different since they were small.
He learned much from the General. Swordsmanship, military theory, and how to play political games. Yet Ascalon remains as pure as the weapon in her hand.
On the battlefield, she cannot be swayed by any words. Her eyes always focus on her highest priority target.
Lettou...!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: This blood...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: A thick, viscous, blood-red color rapidly seeps out of the ground. It turns into a barrier harder than a wall, dividing Lettou and Ascalon.
Doctor, the drones have detected another squad of Sarkaz fighters closing in on our position!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, not just Sarkaz fighters... That surging red...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Have the Corps and our operators keep their distance.;Let Amiya and Logos know.

attributes.content: Okay, Doctor.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's pretty much going exactly the way you said it would. He's heading straight for the top of the command tower!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The vampire's twisted stubbornness is really giving away his movements... I won't be affected by that, will I?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: How are we doing with the drones?;We gotta pick up the pace.

attributes.content: Good news. This command tower is very close to the city walls. I've already located the best route to the control area.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The modern communication methods that the Defense Forces are using are much easier to take advantage of than all that witchcraft the Sarkaz use. I went and disguised my drones' identification codes. None of our long distance signals will be jammed, guaranteed.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Though... drones are very fragile. If they get attacked, that's gonna be all our hard work down the drain.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I just hope that Amiya can stall those guys who really know how put up a good fight up there...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You're weak and foolish, Liberi.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You know a Sarkaz can easily end your life, and you choose not to run?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I am the commander...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: This is my tower.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: My men... They're all still here.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Perhaps I should consider cleaning them up first, then.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Hm? These Arts.... This scent...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ah... I see, the foolish pretender is here.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This is our first proper meeting, 'King of Sarkaz.'
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I've met you plenty of times before, Vampire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Countless Self-Salvation Corps fighters sacrificed themselves because of you. I remember all their names, and their lives won't carry any less weight than they deserve just because you look down on them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, what do you intend to do, King?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Will you use that... pitch-black axe of yours to end me?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Caster team, sniper team, join me and tear down his blood defense! No time to lose. Seize the target!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All at once, black lines and bolts dart into the thick, blood-colored layer.
Nothing has changed.
You disappoint me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Cautus, you assume the stance of a warrior, yet you deny the necessity of killing in politics. You are even weaker than Theresa.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Theresa was a ridiculous one... She tried to have the Sarkaz bow down to our invaders, namely Victoria.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And the most foolish of her actions was undoubtedly her decision to make you her successor.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Focus fire!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What a pointless struggle...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Disperse.
Hm?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Right before the tide of blood reaches Amiya, it's suddenly sliced apart in one clean cut.
I see.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: In addition to the assassin who was your vanguard, you brought another servant with you.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I am Amiya's employee, not her servant.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Banshee.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Are you perhaps afraid?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You think... by hiding in that shell called Rhodes Island, you can refute your relationship with this counterfeit, and escape Kazdel's judgment on its traitors?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Your words are always riddled with falsehoods, Vampire.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Although only for the time being, I took off my Rhodes Island elite operator uniform the moment we decided to come to Londinium.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I'm the Lord of the Banshees.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Wheresoever I speak, there lies the Elegiac Court.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The young Banshee raises his hand.
On his dark-colored robe, his incantations quiver softly like the first drop of dew dripping down under morning sun.
It is not the crown that I follow.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It is precisely Her Majesty Theresa's ideals that have driven me this far. You took her life and desecrated it, but you can't extinguish the flame that she lit before our eyes.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How can someone who has seen daybreak return to an eternal night?
attributes.name: Logos
